c74object.name: o.clip
c74object.description: clip can already handle lists...not sure since what version...

objarg.name: minimum
objarg.description: The minimum value is the lower limit to the range of output values allowed. If only one argument is present, it is used as both the minimum and maximum limit. If no argument is present, the minimum and maximum limit is 0.

objarg.name: maximum
objarg.description: The maximum value is the upper limit to the range of output values allowed. If only one argument is present, it is used as both the minimum and maximum limit. If no argument is present, the minimum and maximum limit is 0.

method.name: int
method.description: The number is sent out the outlet, constrained within the minimum and maximum limits specified by the minimum and maximum limits. The clip object adapts the clipped output values to its input, so an integer input value will output an integer value regardless of the numeric type specified as an argument.

method.name: float
method.description: The number is sent out the outlet, constrained within the minimum and maximum limits. The clip object adapts the clipped output values to its input, so a floating point input value will output a floating point value regardless of the numeric type specified as an argument.

method.name: list
method.description: Each number in the list is constrained within the minimum and maximum limits, and the constrained numbers are sent out as a list.

method.name: set
method.description: The word set, followed by two numbers, resets the minimum and maximum limits.

example.caption: Numbers are always kept within the specified range

entry.name: int
entry.description: When an int is received in the inlet, it is constrained within the specified minimum and maximum limits, then sent out the outlet. If the received number is less than the minimum limit, the minimum value is sent out; if the received number is greater than the maximum limit, the maximum value is sent out.

entry.name: float
entry.description: If the received number is a float, it is constrained within the specified minimum and maximum limits, then sent out the outlet as a float.

entry.name: list
entry.description: When a list is received in the inlet, each number is constrained within the specified minimum and maximum limits, and the numbers are sent out as a list.
